column4: Rubin 'rmmod wlan' returns 'ERROR: Modue wlan is in use by wlan_wep,ath_pci,ath_rate_sample

and the module is what ath0 uses?

Rubin ifup ath0 returns There is already a pid file /var/run/dhclient.ath0.pid with pid 0
delete the file
sudo rm /var/run/dhclient.ath0.pid and try again
delete the file
ok did
now what
now try again sudo ifup ath0
'sudo ifup ath0' returns Internet Systems.... then sit0: unknown h/w address...
does ath0 show up in ifconfig -a?
yes
are you sure that your router works fine? it seems that the problem is in the router
that was my thinking, however, I can connect fine in windows
i think that i can not help you further sorry
